<<<<<<< HEAD
[A comedy concernynge thre lawes, of nature Moses, & Christ, corrupted by the sodomytes. Pharysees and Papystes Compyled by Iohan Bale. Anno M. D.XXXVIII.] Comedy concernynge thre lawes Bale, John, 1495-1563.
[104] p.
Anno M. D. XXXVIII, and lately inprented per Nicolaum Bamburgensem [i.e. Dirik van der Straten], [[Wesel] : 1538 [i.e. 1548?]]
In verse. Title from Greg. Imprint from colophon is false; actual printer's name and suggested publication date from STC. Signatures: A-F G⁴. Imperfect: lacks title page. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[104] p.
Anno M. D. XXXVIII, and lately inprented per Nicolaum Bamburgensem [i.e. Dirik van der Straten], [[Wesel] : 1538 [i.e. 1548?]]
In verse. Title from Greg. Imprint from colophon is false; actual printer's name and suggested publication date from STC. Signatures: A-F G⁴. Imperfect: lacks title page. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Nicolaum Bamburgensem [i.e. Dirik van der Straten]
